mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cart_product_number AS "cartProductNumber", a.cart_create_time AS "cartCreateTime", a.cart_state AS "cartState", a.watch_id AS "watchId", a.user_id AS "userId"
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id AS "watchPicture.id", b.picture_src AS "watchPicture.pictureSrc", b.picture_sort AS "watchPicture.pictureSort", c.id AS "watch.id", c.watch_title AS "watch.watchTitle", c.watch_pre_price AS "watch.watchPrePrice", c.watch_number AS "watch.watchNumber",
FROM watch_cart a LEFT JOIN watch_picture b on a.watch_id=b.watch_id LEFT JOIN watch c ON c.id = a.watch_id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and a.user_id= #{id} ORDER BY b.picture_sort;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watch_cart( id, cart_product_number, cart_create_time, cart_state, watch_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cartProductNumber}, #{cartCreateTime}, #{cartState}, #{watchId}, #{userId} )
